response.message:
Why *749* in *Achieved a flag weight of 749 by reviewing and flagging appropriately* for marshal, while most other numbers are round in the decimal system? 

Just a joke?  
A tribute of some kind to number 7 (749 is divisible by 7 => 107*7 = 749)?
@Stefan W.: No joke, merely a misunderstanding: http://meta.stackoverflow.com/questions/103423/why-is-the-marshal-badge-awarded-at-a-flag-weight-of-749-and-not-at-750
Dude... where can I get some of those IRL badges?!
@Michael You can get the Github one from the shop: http://shop.github.com/products/open-source-nerd-merit-badge
*facepalm* or you can simply click the image in the article... I need coffee :D
